name: "Third Eye II" (Flash Beam/Silver)
description:
Retro - Reflective Night Time Awareness Patch

LIGHT-BEARING PATCHES AND TAGS
Online Digital Millenium Copyright Act (DCMA) 
 2009-2013. Utility Patent #8317340.

These innovative modular light units are geared for Anime and other major known and unknown characters. This product is poised to work well on car windows, wallets, motorcycles and helmets also. LICENSING AVAILABLE. Thanks.

3.5" Diameter

Art/Design
By Damion Silver

For Stuff

name: Ethos/Design
description:
These Reflective Patches+Tags are designed to make pedestrians + kids more visible at night.  Parents can sport them on clothing for summer strolls. 

They attract light and adhere to:
backpacks
bikes
messenger bags/wallets
luggage
+skateboards. 

Designed to create visible awareness around my child and other children or Teens, they add graphic attention to pedestrians in a fashion forward way. 

These are powerful graphic products made to weather storms. 

The idea behind graphic awareness patches was to create a product for our children to be seen wearing something cool, highly practical, Utilitarian and inexpensive.  We also decided to solve a problem in a fashion-friendly way that increases pedestrian visibility and driver awareness all around. These modular patches are a beautiful way to help protect what is most valuable, in motion: your family and even other drivers on the road. 

Motto: “Be Safe+Have Fun!” 

Prototypes, first and second printing. 

Contact@batandbunny.com.

Licensing Opportunities 

2009-2013. Utility Patent #8317340.

name: B. Boy, Light Patch + Tag
description:
These Reflective Patches+Tags are designed to make pedestrians + kids more visible at night.  Parents can use them, too.

They attract light and adhere to backpacks, bikes, messenger bags, wallets, moving vehicles, and skateboards. 

Designed to create visible awareness around my child and other children or Teens, they add graphic attention to apparel and stuff. 

These graphic products are made to weather storms. 

The idea behind graphic awareness patches was to create a product for our children to be seen wearing something cool, highly practical and inexpensive as they travel.

We also decided to solve a problem in a fashion-friendly way. 

These modular patches are beautiful practical objects that protect what is most valuable, in motion: your family and even other drivers on the road. 

Motto: “Be Safe+Have Fun!” 

Prototype Packages Available Upon Request. 

2009-2013. Utility Patent #8317340.

name: Dragonfly1 + Dragonfly2
description:
Patch Design, by Michael Flesch

Hi Fi Patches + Tags

The idea behind graphic awareness patches was to create a product for our children to be seen wearing something cool, highly practical and inexpensive, We think Pedestrians + Skateboarders have the right to be seen. We also decided to solve a problem in a fashion-friendly way that increases pedestrian visibility and driver awareness of kids and adults. These modular patches are a beautiful way to help protect what is most valuable, in motion: your family and even other drivers on the road.

2009-2013. Utility Patent #8317340.
